body.p:
Louisville Feby 27/ 64
Mr. James Harlan Esq.

D Sir,Your letter Came to hand this morning. I find from reference to my order book that Geo Miller was convicted together with Samuel Stout, (for felony) he was convicted on the 11th May 1864, and sentenced on the 17th May 1864 for a term of Three (3) years I do not remember who appeared as his Counsel, or whether approved by the Court or not

Very Respectfully
J. B. Sargent
Deputy Ck
Jeff Ct Ct.
